amendment.description: Amendment makes retroactive to Sept. 11, 2001, an exemption made to service-members with combat-related injuries from the requirement of paying for subsistence charges while hospitalized; and provides for repayment to those members who paid the charge.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to exempt members with combat-related injuries from requirement for payment of subsistence charges while hospitalized.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Young (FL) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Young (FL).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Young (FL) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
